sentences.sContent: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.sContent_eng: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.sCn: 在这些事情上我们都听她的。

sentences.sContent: We shall go through these papers together.
sentences.sContent_eng: We shall go through these papers together.
sentences.sCn: 我们将在一起审阅这些论文。
